creator: dev@xam.de
text:
I am looking desperatly to find the XSLT or other transformation patterns & 
tools which generate from the .tld file the nicely formatted HTML pages. It 
would be helpful to document your own tlds.

creator: glenn@apache.org
text:
The application taglib is documented.  I don't see where this is a bug.
If you have a question about how jakarta-taglibs does its builds please
ask on the taglibs-dev@jakarta.apache.org list.
